diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $OX$ is $x+4$ units.
The length of the line $OW$ is $x-9$ units.
The length of the line $OY$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $OZ$ is $x-12$ units.
Point $O$ lies on the line connecting $Z$ and $X$.
Point $O$ also lies on the line connecting $Y$ and $W$.
Point $Z$ lies on the circle with center $A$ and radius $3.0$ units.
Point $Y$ lies on the same circle with center $A$ and radius $3.0$ units.
Point $X$ lies on the same circle with center $A$ and radius $3.0$ units.
Point $W$ lies on the same circle with center $A$ and radius $3.0$ units.
line_instances: There are lines $OW$, $OY$, $OZ$, $OX$, $WY$ and $ZX$ connecting different points.
circle_instances: There is a circle with center at point A.
